ESPA3.SA.summary: MPM CorpÃ³reos S.A. operates as a laser hair removal company in Brazil. As of December 31, 2019, it had 514 stores that are owned by and franchises; 6 laser hair removal stores in Argentina through the partner brand Definit; and 6 Estudioface stores, which offers facial aesthetics services. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

GGPS3.SA.summary: GPS ParticipaÃ§Ãµes e Empreendimentos S.A. provides security, facilities, logistics, utility engineering, industrial services, catering, and infrastructure services in Brazil. Its security services include property security, firefighting and prevention, personal security, armed escort, event security, integrated security solution, monitoring center operation, and civil aviation security services. The company's facilities services comprise cleaning and conservation, operational support, technical and industrial cleaning, caterers and servers, hospital cleaning and sanitizing, building maintenance, reception desk and gatehouse, administrative support, firefighting, specialized, landscaping and plant maintenance, and indoor waste management services. It also installs, operates, and maintains utility systems; offers indoor logistics and industrial maintenance services; and operates restaurants. In addition, the company offers airport and port infrastructure, and highway maintenance and conservation services; and gas pipelines and distribution, sanitation, mining, railroad, and energy infrastructure and maintenance services.
